mapper.select: SELECT xt_monitor_id, xt_monitor_userName, xt_monitor_accountName, xt_monitor_comName, xt_monitor_localName, xt_monitor_jvm_totalMem, xt_monitor_jvm_Mem, xt_monitor_operate_sysName, xt_monitor_operate_org, xt_monitor_jvm_cup_count, xt_monitorIP, xt_monitor_environment, xt_monitorPath, xt_monitorTime FROM xt_monitor WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xt_monitorTime DESC

SELECT xt_monitor_id, xt_monitor_userName, xt_monitor_accountName, xt_monitor_comName, xt_monitor_localName, xt_monitor_jvm_totalMem, xt_monitor_jvm_Mem, xt_monitor_operate_sysName, xt_monitor_operate_org, xt_monitor_jvm_cup_count, xt_monitorIP, xt_monitor_environment, xt_monitorPath, xt_monitorTime FROM xt_monitor WHERE xt_monitor_id=#{xt_monitor_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xt_monitor ( xt_monitor_id, xt_monitor_userName, xt_monitor_accountName, xt_monitor_comName, xt_monitor_localName, xt_monitor_jvm_totalMem, xt_monitor_jvm_Mem, xt_monitor_operate_sysName, xt_monitor_operate_org, xt_monitor_jvm_cup_count, xt_monitorIP, xt_monitor_environment, xt_monitorPath, xt_monitorTime ) VALUES ( #{xt_monitor_id}, #{xt_monitor_userName}, #{xt_monitor_accountName}, #{xt_monitor_comName}, #{xt_monitor_localName}, #{xt_monitor_jvm_totalMem}, #{xt_monitor_jvm_Mem}, #{xt_monitor_operate_sysName}, #{xt_monitor_operate_org}, #{xt_monitor_jvm_cup_count}, #{xt_monitorIP}, #{xt_monitor_environment}, #{xt_monitorPath}, #{xt_monitorTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xt_monitor SET xt_monitor_userName = #{xt_monitor_userName}, xt_monitor_accountName = #{xt_monitor_accountName}, xt_monitor_comName = #{xt_monitor_comName}, xt_monitor_localName = #{xt_monitor_localName}, xt_monitor_jvm_totalMem = #{xt_monitor_jvm_totalMem}, xt_monitor_jvm_Mem = #{xt_monitor_jvm_Mem}, xt_monitor_operate_sysName = #{xt_monitor_operate_sysName}, xt_monitor_operate_org = #{xt_monitor_operate_org}, xt_monitor_jvm_cup_count = #{xt_monitor_jvm_cup_count}, xt_monitorIP = #{xt_monitorIP}, xt_monitor_environment = #{xt_monitor_environment}, xt_monitorPath = #{xt_monitorPath} WHERE xt_monitor_id=#{xt_monitor_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_monitor WHERE xt_monitor_id IN
#{item}
